name: Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong
overview: Originally released for Famicom in 1987, Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong made its way to MSX2 one year later, thanks to the good folks at Pack-In-Video. The game is identical to its Famicom counterpart and features some solid 1v1 mahjong action.
